org.netbeans.core

Class Services

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openide.ServiceType.Registry
      • org.netbeans.core.Services
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, EventListener, LookupListener
    Deprecated. 
    Obsoleted by lookup and new settings system.

    @Deprecated
public final class Services
extends ServiceType.Registry
implements LookupListener
    Works with all service types.
    See Also:

        public void setServiceTypes(List arr0)
